title: Object storage
pageDescription: VK Cloud Storage is an object storage with support for S3 API, which provides reliable scalable storage and a stable speed of distribution of any objects, regardless of the number of simultaneous requests. Examples of using the storage: streaming multimedia, hosting sites, storing transaction logs, electronic documents, storing big data, storing backups and archives.
shortDescription: Storing and transferring data in its original form via S3 API and UI
